Reviews.Title: “We LOVE this fantastic Beach Front Motel”
Reviews.Author: HanglooseMoose
Reviews.Content: There is always a warm welcome at the Ocean Court. Dave, Lynda and Andrew are Fantastic owners ( and Fred, Tony & his wife are great front desk helpers ) The rooms are serviced and cleaned by excellent staff, I don't know how they manage to cope with the heat. The larger family rooms tend to be upstairs and have plenty of room for a family of 4. Great beachside pool, shuffleboard for the kids, plenty of BBQ space and shady tiki huts to escape the sun. Relaxing on a lounger, overlooking the beach, sipping a cool drink and watching the world go by is why we return year after year to Ocean Court. I'm sure if you choose to stay here, you will love it too. Cheers

Reviews.Title: “Very nice place”
Reviews.Author: DutchBlokeEindhoven
Reviews.Content: This motel is situated right on the beach in Daytona. It's a charming little place that takes you back to the late seventies in the right way. Very friendly staff and very clean rooms. Comfortable beds, very nice pool and free coffee in the morning. Perfect for families but couples will enjoy this place too. Cannot think of anything to improve this place.

Reviews.Title: “Just like going home”
Reviews.Author: James W
Reviews.Content: My family and I have been staying here since 1972. All of the staff treats us just like we are family. We know each of them and there is no to very low staff turnover. The staff speaks highly of the owners. Dave, Lynda and Andrew ( the owners) make sure your vacation is awesome. The rooms are clean, The grounds are clean and the housekeeping staff will go out of their way to accommodate you. Very affordable. Fimily oreinted. We have a standing reservation for our room for next year. I grew up comming here as a young child and I am watching my childern do the same things i did. Great place for building a lifetime of memories.

Reviews.Title: “Loved it!”
Reviews.Author: Yvonne W
Reviews.Content: Just got back after a 4 day stay loved it. It was the cleanest motel I have ever stayed in and I have been in a lot! The staff was friendly and its right on the beach..

Reviews.Title: “Close to everything and quiet”
Reviews.Author: MicciPueblo
Reviews.Content: A retro motel but very comfortable and friendly staff. We enjoyed a balcony with ocean view. This is a very small motel, no frills,etc. Perfect place to be away from the crowds.

Reviews.Title: “Great value, clean room, friendly owners”
Reviews.Author: Cayla J
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the ocean court for one night on our way from Charleston to Miami. It happened to be valentines day on the night of our stay, but that wasn't planned. The room was a great value, I checked several surrounding hotels, in person, asking for rates, and Ocean court was the best. Our room was immaculate. It wasn't brand new, but had some nice updates like a flat screen tv. we stayed in an efficiency, and the kitchen was spotless, as was the bath. The owners were great, and we enjoyed their British pride. Location is spot on, on the waterfront, with a small pool. our particular room did not have ocean view, but many of them do. Overall, a great stay, would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “wonderful holiday ... again!”
Reviews.Author: Linda M
Reviews.Content: Still our favourite place to stay! We're having a fabulous vacation!

Reviews.Title: “Yearly Vacation”
Reviews.Author: Linda M
Reviews.Content: We travel to Daytona every year and stay at this friendly, convenient motel. We have no desire to change locations as this accommodation has everything we could possibly need for an extended vacation: clean, beachfront, kitchenette, barbeque, balcony and nice people. We recommend it!

Reviews.Title: “Solid ~ Well run”
Reviews.Author: DesertDweller32
Reviews.Content: Pleased with experience. These owners have integrity. Refreshing!

Reviews.Title: “Best Value on the Beach!”
Reviews.Author: keeners1
Reviews.Content: Another great stay at Dayton Beach at the Ocean Court. Affordable accommodations, friendly staff, and right on the World's Most Famous Beach.

Reviews.Title: “Great little motel”
Reviews.Author: SecondBaseman
Reviews.Content: Had a very pleasant stay with no hassles. Would stay again!

Reviews.Title: “Lovely stay”
Reviews.Author: christianfam
Reviews.Content: We stayed june 1 through the 7th, 2010. We had a lovely time. The grounds are beautifully maintained. Pool and rooms spotless. House keepers and office staff super friendly. Economical and a great location. Over all good stay.

Reviews.Title: “So glad I found this hotel”
Reviews.Author: Irene2008hd
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the hotel last week with a group of 5 for Bike Week 2011. The hotel is an old -style Florida family hotel and to me this is an advantage. The staff were very helpful and the parking was well organized to accomodate trailers, trucks and of course motorcycles. The rooms are really clean and we had plenty of room in the 2 bedroom apartment. The pool is great, and being right on the beach is a big plus. We are already planning for next year.

Reviews.Title: “Location, friendly, comfortable,affordable,clean.”
Reviews.Author: rslec25
Reviews.Content: Didn't expect the Waldorf. Room was clean & comfortable. Balcony looked out on the beach. Owners were very friendly & accomodating. Great value for the money. Would stay again!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place...”
Reviews.Author: beagle1962
Reviews.Content: This Motel was spectacular!!!! The most friendly staff we have ever visited....The rooms were spotless warm and cozy......The grounds,view and pool were beautiful...I'm counting down the days to when we return next year....

Reviews.Title: “A Great, Affordable Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: kenlax00
Reviews.Content: The Ocean Court Motel is not, nor does it try to be, a fancy resort. What it is, however, is a nice little motel right on the beach at a very affordable cost. We arrived at about 12:30 on a Friday afternoon for the Rolex 24, and had no trouble checking in. The main bunch of rooms are all in a courtyard, with many facing into the courtyard. There are, however, many ocean view rooms that are on the second floor, and "Room 101", a very large oceanfront room. The pool was heated to a comfortable 85 degrees, and there were more than enough places to sit and eat a lunch around the property overlooking the beach. As an added bonus, the hotel is on the corner of a beach access road, so putting your car on the beach takes as long as however long it takes to you to back out of your parking spot and roll down the hill. We were in room 14. It's a smaller room than many of the other rooms, but it was also under $70/night. The room was clean, and had every amenity that I could ask for, including a fridge, stove, kitchen sink, cable TV and comfortable beds. My *only* complaint is the lack of a vent in the bathroom. Aside from that, the room was fantastic. As a bonus, the wireless internet was strong all the way around the facility. The Ocean Court Motel is relatively "no frills", but if you're looking for a nice, clean place to stay with a friendly staff, there aren't many better places to go.

Reviews.Title: “Really friendly like home from home”
Reviews.Author: jentaylor130183
Reviews.Content: We come from england most years we would never stay any where else but here because you can relax and enjoy the atomosphere and the people that stay there are really friendly

Reviews.Title: “Friendly, relaxing,clean,right on the beach,pool is warm.....85d!!”
Reviews.Author: Partington24
Reviews.Content: We stay here for a month for the last 10yrs and always feel that it is our home away from home! Dave & Lynda make sure that all your needs are met! I have recommended their motel to family and friends and all have returned year after year! There is no bells and whistles here but man can you relaxe and have fun! The staff keep all the rooms super clean,and are very friendly, and cater to all your needs!

Reviews.Title: “Keep Looking”
Reviews.Author: kimberly5300
Reviews.Content: As I do every year, I chose Ocean Court based on reviews that I read through Trip Advisor. It's never failed me before but this time it really let me down. I don't know what everyone is talking about when they say this motel is great. We must be staying at two different places because the place that I styaed had a run down feel to it and badly needed updating. I won't even mention the 2 roaches or multiple spiders that we found in our room. It got to the point that I was constantly looking for bugs. The room itself was ok but not the best I've seen. The TV was hung awkwardly on the wall (in front of the door?) and the beds are probably 30 years old. I've slept on floors more confortable. Lastly, the housekeeping service is good but it may take them till 3 in the afternoon to get to you. At that point, you may as well clean the room yourself. Bottom line.... do yourself a favor and stay at one of the many other wonderful hotels/motels in Daytona Beach.

Reviews.Title: “Very, very clean and right on the beach”
Reviews.Author: AthenaGr
Reviews.Content: Absolutely clean room, pool and yard! Perfect location – right on the beach! Extremely accommodating and friendly staff! Charming “old Florida” motel! We discovered Ocean Court last year and decided to give it a try: stayed for one week, paid less than $60/night. It was a great deal! We are looking forward to be there again after Labor Day’2010.

Reviews.Title: “Old Smokey with Grease ... Keep Looking”
Reviews.Author: rvwaterbug
Reviews.Content: Not a real bad place but it is old style and right next to the vehicle access road onto the beach. Our 2nd floor room was ok actually. Everything worked and was clean. Kitchen was excellent. Staff was pleasant. Downstairs tho we walked a wall of outside smokers to get to our room. Seemed like every room had 2 or 3 smokers in it. Weird! Also the grills provided didn't look like they were cleaned since? and the grease stains were all over the concrete decking which gave the place an unclean appearance along with the lack of exterior paint. Otherwise, pool was clean and walk down to beach was great. I wouldn't stay there again tho. Keep looking cause there are better for the $ . p.s. Kids never noticed the downside but I wouldn't be trying ro impress a lady friend by taking her there.

Reviews.Title: “Beware of the great reviews!”
Reviews.Author: Deepat0216
Reviews.Content: We booked this motel based on the reviews here on tripadvisor and we were very disappointed. I realize that everyone has different opinions, but this place got great reviews and was rated #7 of Daytona Beach motels, so we booked it online sight unseen. Come on people! This can not be one of the top ten places to stay on Daytona Beach. The outside needs some serious attention with some paint and our room was tiny, as well as the pool. We had booked for two nights and decided to leave early. At the Ocean Court Motel, they charge your card when you get there and are told "Sorry mate, no refunds" if you try to leave early. My suggestion: Don't book online and don't give a credit card until you see the place with your own eyes. Now, it is right on the beach and the price is a lot less than for other beach side properties, but in my opinion this is a case of you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing location, older hotel rooms, great service.”
Reviews.Author: Trevor K
Reviews.Content: I liked this place. Unlike our PA reviewer in December 09, I wont make any comments which suggest US hotels are better than British. Far from it. This is run by a Birmingham UK family and they had a great attitude. They loaned me two body boards for my kids and went to a lot of trouble to do so. True, the rooms are dated. But they are clean and the location really is perfection. And at under $60 a night? Great value.

Reviews.Title: “Best kept secret ON THE BEACH!”
Reviews.Author: luvtammy
Reviews.Content: Our stay at the Ocean Court Motel was absolutely wonderful. I always like the little "Mom & Pop" style motels. I was leary at first, but the friendly staff showed us around before we booked the room. This was probably built in the 60's, but it was very clean with updated furniture, light fixtures, carpet, nice comfortable bed, etc. The kitchenette even includes all of the dishes, utensils and toaster. It was a great value, especially for being right on the beach! They have a heated pool and shuffleboard. I always like to stay on the beach right up until the last minute of the trip and they let us check out an hour after regular check-out time. I would definitely stay again. I figured I saved $$$ by staying here, so I picked better restaurants for dinner time! Check out their website!

Reviews.Title: “HOME AWAY FROM HOME - Ocean, heated outside pool, grills, grass and mechanic on site!”
Reviews.Author: destiny28ky
Reviews.Content: We stayed one-month here. At first, going to stay one-week. Heated outside pool with GREAT MUSIC being played. Every morning the pool is cleaned; not that you ever notice it needs cleaned. The way the hotel is set up to get to your hotel door is so cozy and safe. It is outside doors; but the front of your door faces inner (away from the cars in the parking lot) so, you face inner, in this "safe little circle" with very beauitful grass! Lighting, soft playing music.... quiet, can hear the ocean - with staff and other hotel guests right at your fingertips if you need someone. This is a family owned business and they are precious; from England. There is another England couple who help run the business and he even helped us jump start our car!!! Mechanic on site; what a deal! When the staff refreshes/cleans your room; it's truly cleaning items you use at home - pinesol, lysol... items you truly recognize and make you feel so much at home yet still on vacation. I loved having the outdoor grills - not only do you have a full-size kitchen and all in your room; but the grills outside to pull to your room - is such a GREAT FAMILY TOUCH! Who doesn't love great, easy grilled food. They even have a little tyke play side for your smaller children to enjoy there on the nice grass. You always see the owner's son picking up things... keeping the business beauitful for your stay. If you feel like chatting; you can with the owners. If you feel like being left alone - they respect that too. There is no pressure there. Just the full help to enjoy your stay. They are also very familiar with things to do in the area; just ask. This business has families who have came for many, many years. A lot of famiies show back up at the same time along with other families that they actually met at Ocean Court. You can keep to yourself or make life long friends. It will be your choice. It's a little outdated and the mattresses are in need of replacing... but, for the personal touch the place adds - it is minor in detail. And for all I know; they have now replaced some or all of the mattresses. Updates take time. I'd rather a business do them gradually and keep the price down than to do repairs all at once at raise prices because of the debt. OH and the rooms have a recliner in them. That's a personal touch of home. Personally touches are needed; otherwise, you wind up missing home. You can also rent a laptop for $10.00 a day. That is great for your children or even business that may come up for yourself. Give it a try - the business is rating a B for good so far .... ranked number 10 out of 112 different choices... I'd say it's batting a great average!

Reviews.Title: “Nice Place, Lock your Room”
Reviews.Author: penguinnet
Reviews.Content: Wife and I stayed here in early 2009 for a weekend getaway. This is our type of place. Older place, friendly people, right on the beach, and inexpensive. We seek these gems out wherever we travel. That said, I feel it's my duty to report that right after check-in, we headed to the room, dropped off our stuff, and walked to the beach. About an hour later we returned to find both of our wallets stolen out of the room. After the police came and wrote up the report, the owners of the motel lent us some cash until we could get a credit card advance the next day. Overall the motel was nice, and the staff appeared most regretful and then helpful. We stayed the remainder of our reservation without event. Lock your room well and maybe take your wallet with you when you leave.

Reviews.Title: “LOVE THIS PLACE!!!”
Reviews.Author: luvgatlinburg
Reviews.Content: I don't know what that bad review could be about. Sure this is a small, older motel but that is what is great about it. It is extremely hard to find a great, clean, small place but this is one. We've stayed here for two years in a row. It reminds me of when I was young and how it felt to come to Daytona. We asked about upgrading my parent's room for their 50th and everyone was super accommodating. Just an all around great place and owners and staff.

Reviews.Title: “Dingy, dated, one son of owner was arrogant and rude”
Reviews.Author: leahfam
Reviews.Content: We cut our stay at this motel short- 2 days was quite enough- thank goodness we hadn't booked for longer- as I've now read reviews of their "no refund policy"! We went to another hotel and had a much more pleasant stay in a bright, clean room with a courteous staff- we were so comfortable there we decided to extend our stay! I wish I would have read reviews before staying at ocean court- we would have went elsewhere. This motel is badly in need of updating, a thorough cleaning, and staff attitude adjustment. I have no idea how they do business- I would imagine none of it is repeat business- I know we won't be back. Perhaps they would be better suited to operate a motel in England?

Reviews.Title: “OceanCourt Motel - Daytona Beach FL”
Reviews.Author: KellyKiefer
Reviews.Content: Looking for a GREAT place on the ocean in Daytona Beach...try the OceanCourt Motel. I have stayed there 3 times this last year and I love it. The owners/staff are wondeful and do everything to make sure your stay is enjoyable. Rooms are clean and the area is very. With a heated pool and shuffleboard there is always plenty to do. The ocean is only steps away so sit back and enjoy the view.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place!”
Reviews.Author: karen&roy
Reviews.Content: Stayed 4 days during the xmas holidays to visit family and it was wonderful! I was shocked at the value for being right on the beach. Nice room with balcony, fridge, microwave and so clean! The english family that owns it are wonderful, and always kept the place immaculate. i will make this our place to stay in daytona

Reviews.Title: “Out of this world”
Reviews.Author: wilf440
Reviews.Content: Spent 10 lovely days at the ocean court motel, located right on the beach, and the pool was lovely and is cleaned every morning by the owners son, Have to mention dave and his wife, thank you for being so helpful, jim and his wife(friends of dave who help run the motel) you a diamond, thank you for make my stay one to remember,. located with-in easy reach of shops, dinning out, attractions, this place comes highly recommended and i will be retuning with my in the near future,

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay for a low price”
Reviews.Author: gary4520
Reviews.Content: We been there for 2 months ( jan-feb 2009 ). Rooms are clean, staff is friendly and very helpfull. Pool and beach are great. It is not a 5 stars hotel, hey for a low price like that, what do you expect....a Marriot. We will return every year and for 3 months this time. We felt like home because of the staff. I am not saying it is perfect.....but look around and you will be back. First, forget review older that 2008. don't you improve yourself year after year. They certainly did from what I read on old reviews. All my best regards to the complete staff...can't wait to see you again.

Reviews.Title: “Still the Best”
Reviews.Author: InnyJ
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Ocean Court last August and loved it, so decided to go back this year. The motel was just what I was looking for, right on the ocean. Had a balcony room, and could see the ocean from the balcony. Since the room was an efficiency room, could make own meals and save a lot on restaurants. Went with my friend and her twin granddaughters (5 yrs old). We all went last year, too. The room was very clean and had two beds. We also had a full sized fridge, stove, microwave, and coffee pot. All needed dishes and cooking utinsels were included. Just make sure to bring your own coffee if you'd like it in your room. There is coffee in the front office beginning at 8 a.m. The pool was clean and of a very comfortable temperature. Everyone, both the staff and the other hotel guests were very friendly. The children made new friends each year. I would recommend this hotel to anyone who wants an inexpensive beach vacation. Our room was approx. $100 per night, but room prices vary (going down to $75) and are even less expensive during other months of the year.

Reviews.Title: “Will definately be back.”
Reviews.Author: turtlefp
Reviews.Content: We stayed for five nights and had a great time. The rooms are very clean, (even the bathroom corners), the pool is warm and clear, and if you walk off the lawn you pretty much fall in the ocean. We had a problem getting our coffee maker to work (I'm a coffeeaholic), but the housekeeper was out early, took our coffee maker, and replaced it immediately. I had coffee by the time breakfast was ready. The staff is wonderful. They won't blow you off. Anyway, if a little age and wear is a big concern, don't stay, but it you're looking for somewhere clean, comfortable, and right on the beach, this is the place.

Reviews.Title: “Best, Cleanest Place to Stay - Most Customers are Repeat Customers”
Reviews.Author: lasvegasisgreat
Reviews.Content: We were upgraded to a oceanside suite upon arrival for a few $ more that just came available. The owner insisted we look at the room we booked and the new suite that became available. They both were equally nice. The balcony provided a birds eye view of the ocean & the beautiful courtyard & pool. The room was large & oh so clean! We stayed 4 nights - wish it was more! Most people we talked with were here with additional family that had other rooms. One couple was visting the motel for 21 years. We saw the cleaning staff washing the front doors of each room one morning and another staff actually removing the comforters to be washed. Unbelievably clean here! We asked if our airline tickets could be printed and they said yes and would not take a gratuity! We are choosey people. This is the place to stay & now we no longer need to search for a great place!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location”
Reviews.Author: Daffodildazy
Reviews.Content: The location of the motel is fantastic, right on the beach. Loads of parking, nice rooms, comfy beds, very clean apart from the smell of cigarette smoke. Lovely warm pool. There is a great pub across the road that serves fab burgers, the Axe and Shield and also a good value restaurant, the Ocean Breeze. We would be happy to return.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome small motel with heated pool and beach access for little money!”
Reviews.Author: nordkap
Reviews.Content: The best stay of our entire trip through Florida. Mostly we stayed at Days Inn's, which are decent, but this one is a little jewel. The rooms are all right, their real asset is the small kitchen including stove, oven, microwave, and a large fridge. The owners from Britain speak the cutest English accent I've heard for a long time. They were overwhelmingly friendly and helpful. This overall attitude is also found when looking at the pots and pans in the kitchen, each individually carefully wrapped and nicely placed. We loved walking down to the beach, which directly begins at the end of the property (few stairs down), to enjoy the sunrise. Plus, a nice heated pool right above the beach that we had for ourselves. Overall we couldn't believe to have so much value for so little money. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: “great beach motel”
Reviews.Author: sally 21
Reviews.Content: what a great place.easy to find and right on the beach check in was very friendly and very helpfull. very clean rooms with tv , air con, fridge and micro wave.good bathrooms with powerfull showers and fresh towels each day.no coffee maker in room but reception had coffee on the go from 8am each day.just pop in and pick up a cup.nice grassy area with loungers and chairs to sit out in the sun.pool if you fancied a dip but the beach was just a few steps from your room.what more could you ask for.guest laundry room there too if you need it.guys on reception helpfull and chatty with great sense of humour.would stay here again as we couldn't fault the place

Reviews.Title: “Great bargain!”
Reviews.Content: This hotel is one of the last great deals for ocean lodging. For only $58/night, I had a nice, clean, efficiency room. The air conditioning worked splendidly which is important for Daytona Beach in August. It's not a big unfriendly motel. The pool was a few steps from my room and the ocean just a few more steps more from the pool. The hotel desk clerks are all friendly and go out of their way to help and so are the maids. I could not have asked for a better place.

Reviews.Title: “Loved the Ocean Court”
Reviews.Author: librarychick
Reviews.Content: The Ocean Court was wonderful. The location was great and the room was spacious. We loved having the kitchen and especially enjoyed the grilling areas, shuffleboard, and pool. We had an upstairs private balcony room and I would highly recommend this room. Nice side view of the ocean and I loved being able to sit outside with some privacy. 2 laundry rooms ($1.25 a load-they have quarters in the office) so we were able to do some laundry and dry towels which would have otherwise been impossible due to the Florida humidity. Everyone was very friendly and the housekeeping was exceptional. The kitchen was well stocked. This hotel is not fancy-schmancy but it is clean, well located, personable, and exactly what we were looking for in terms of a place to relax on the beach. We saw at least a dozen dolphins everyday and loved walking the beach, especially at low tide and finding starfish and sand dollars. The outside of the building shows some effects of the climate which should be expected but the owners obviously put a lot of care and hard work into maintaining the property and we have zero complaints. I would highly recommend Ocean Court to anybody looking for a laid back, low key, relaxing place to stay in the Daytona area.

Reviews.Title: “Favorite place”
Reviews.Author: SCTrekkerMom
Reviews.Content: Excellent! Excellent! Excellent! Perfect for families, Nice rooms, very clean.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Place To Stay!”
Reviews.Author: ScottSall
Reviews.Content: We've just returned from a week & a half at the Ocean Court. After reading the other reviews, we booked our vacation here. Their website indicated that they were full for the period, but Anthony managed to squeeze us in, & set us up with a great room. The motel is in a good location, right on the beach, convenient to the Winn Dixie, the beachwear stores, & the attractions. It's also far enough away from the main drag that the unmufflered V-twins won't keep you awake. The rooms are spacious, well-maintained, & clean. A couple of miantenance issues we encountered were promptly remedied. David & his family are very friendly. Be prepared to "chew the fat" for a little while if you go into the office for anything. They are quite knowedgable about good places to eat, attractions to visit, & even automotive repair facilities that will do a good job & not take you to the cleaners. We hated to leave, & we will definitely be returning here!

Reviews.Title: “My favourite place in the world”
Reviews.Author: Hollie23
Reviews.Content: I first started going to Ocean Court when I was about 10 years old. I'm now 24 and out of all my travels it is still my favourite place to go in the whole world, I even went 3 times in one year and take as many people with me as possible to share how wonderful it is. Dave and Lynda and the whole family, including Jan and Tony make a visit to Ocean Court special anyway even without the amazing beach at the foot of the hotel, the clean pool and surrounding deck area, the gardens and tiki huts and the clean, comfortable and excellent value for money rooms (I think i've probably stayed in them all). The hotel is right on the strip and everything anybody could ever need is on the doorstep, great restaurants, many of which are recommended from experience by the staff, shops and nightlife isn't too far away for those wanted to have a drink and dance. I visited with my family for several years including my grandmother and eventually stayed just with my twenty-something friends which shows how it really does cater for everyone. If the sunshine gets a bit too much it's nice just to pop into the office and sit and chat with whoever is manning the desk who you'll feel you've known for years. After 14 years after my 1st visit I am still as impressed with Ocean Court as I was as a young girl and I know i'll be returning for many years to come! Hollie Krause

Reviews.Title: “excellet location”
Reviews.Author: lettyger
Reviews.Content: spent 7 days here in April 2008 - excellent value to have a motel accessing directly onto the beach for the price we paid. The rooms are quite spacious & very clean, & the management & staff are very helpful. The fact that lots of the other residents have been here many many times speaks for itself. Slightly disappointed with Daytona Beach as a whole, though. Even allowing for it not being high season, it was rather quite & in places a little rundown. Not a lot of good quality restaurants.

Reviews.Title: “Ocean Court was GREAT!!”
Reviews.Author: MichiganVicky
Reviews.Content: We had a reservation and did not arrive when we were suppose too. The desk clerk was very kind, understanding and sympathic to our situation. Too our suprise for the price, we did not expect an ocean front room. When we arrived at 3:00 a.m. we had an ocean front room looking down at the pool and the Georgous ocean. The only thing I can say negitive is the room decor was out-dated, but clean. Great Time!!

Reviews.Title: “Exactly what we were looking for!”
Reviews.Author: Selinthia
Reviews.Content: We were looking for accommodations to stay at during the 24 hour Rolex race at Daytona. We wanted a fair priced hotel on the beach so we could spend Thursday and Friday relaxing, but have a place to stay on Saturday night in case we couldn't stay up for the full 24 hours. The Ocean Court Motel met all of our expectations. Though we wanted a non-smoking room, we ended up with a smoking room. Surprisingly, the smell did not bother us so we did not request a different room. The room was clean, though a bit small. Overall, we were very happy considering the price. It even had free wireless internet that worked very well in our room. It was exactly what we were looking for! In addition, the cleaning and office staff are very nice people, and we would not hesitate to stay at this motel again.

Reviews.Title: “A family favourite!”
Reviews.Author: CraigE3
Reviews.Content: Once again my family and my self completely enjoyed our stay at Ocean Court. We have stayed at this quaint little motel many times. It is by far our most favourite out of all the motels we have stayed in over the years. Dave and his sons are fantastic hosts! The rooms are smaller than those in newer motels, but are extremely clean, and they offer all amenities. All in all I highly recommend this great motel.

Reviews.Title: “There must be better places to stay.”
Reviews.Author: deb2311
Reviews.Content: Luckily we had only booked for 1 night at the Ocean Court Motel. The room we were given (which apparently was an upgrade from what we had booked so goodness only knows what we could have got) was dingey, dated and depressing. The bathroom had been recently updated and was the best bit! There were 2 tiny windows with plastic vertical blinds blocking out the tiny bit of sunlight there was. The room was clean but for the money I would have expected abit more. The owners were friendly enough but not very helpful. We ate at a seafood place called Shells north of the hotel which although slightly dated again had good food. Do not under any circumstances eat at PJ Gators, we popped in for a beer and saw a rat running along the ventilation pipes above our head.....!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: mom2miraclez
Reviews.Content: Wonderful place! Going back this year. Dave and Lynda are very wonderful and treat everyone like family. When I was making our reservations for this upcoming trip last Dec, I asked Dave to send me a bag of Daytona sand to suprise my parents with to go along with their christmas gifts. Dave was happy to oblige.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Pleasant”
Reviews.Author: joeingausa
Reviews.Content: This Motel was a good value. We normally stay at resort type hotels, but we were just passing through for an overnighter so we were looking for inexpensive instead of a place loaded with amenities. The Ocean Court Motel was our choice. All of the other reviews were accurate. The staff was super-helpful and the housekeeping staff superb. I hate to echo what others are saying, but it has to be said. I will mention that the place is a bit on the older, dated side. The entry door was a little rusty and the door frame paint was peeling. I was a little scared to open the door and look inside. When I did, I was pleasantly surprised. While the tile in the bathroom and the kitchen appliances (full kitchen) reminded me of Grandmas apartment back in the 1970's, everything was immaculate and in excellent working order. The sheets were fresh. The carpet and bedspread looked very clean as well. The room we were in also had a balcony that was larger than many at more expensive hotels. The pool was clean. The beach had very little sand at high tide, but since we were not in front of a high rise filled with hundreds of people, we were still able to find plenty of space to set up our chairs and blankets. Many of the other occupants seemed to be returnees. They were friendly and very helpful. They were mostly regular families (not the snobbish type that do not want to be bothered). The property also had a couple of grills outdoors for cooking and a couple of grocery stores nearby. If you are looking for a place to call home for a few days, stay here. If you are looking for a posh hotel full of amenities with all of the extras associated with resorts, then you may not be happy here. But it is a great value for what you do get.

Reviews.Title: “The best motel”
Reviews.Author: snowbaby-7
Reviews.Content: The best motel on Daytona its a family owned place. We loved it because it feels like a big family reunion. There is not many of these small lodgings left. The rooms are very clean. I can't wait to go back there next year.

Reviews.Title: “Such a great motel for the incredibly low price”
Reviews.Author: EricBMontreal
Reviews.Content: Dave, the hotel manager, knew who we were when we entered the lobby of his motel. He told us we had the biggest room of his hotel, a 2 bedroom efficiency that can fit 8 people. We were about 1 minute to the magnificient beach of Daytona Beach. The pool was so clean, and it was open all night with good music (not so loud to disturb other guests). Our room was so huge, with a nice kitchen, fully equiped, and it had 1 king bed, 2 double beds and 1 double size sofa bed. This room was about 150$ us a night, it was a really good deal, we were 2 minutes from the Winn-Dixie grocery store. This is the biggest room of the place, you can have smaller rooms for about 80-90$ a night. There was a lifeguard right in front of our motel, to protect us from the nice and big tides of Daytona Beach. I will go back to Daytona Beach next year, in part because of the beach, in other part because of nice english hospitality that Dave and his family provides at the Ocean Court motel.

Reviews.Title: “Quaint as well as a good value”
Reviews.Author: pikespice
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical over the fact that they offered single rooms for 62/night in late June, but based on these reviews, I decided to give it a try. It's one of those smaller hotels between 2 bigger ones and it's easy to miss when driving down Atlantic Ave. The rooms were definitely kept clean as was the courtyard. The hotel is down past the crowded areas of Daytona, so this would be a good place if you go to the beach to either lay out or swim. Pretty much the only complaints I had were that the parking lot was small & there was no microwave in the room.

Reviews.Title: “We found our new summer family homeplace”
Reviews.Author: lmartin345
Reviews.Content: I chose the Ocean Court Motel based upon the reviews of past guests. I would say cleanliness ratings are a huge factor in my choice of hotel. Ocean Court had great review on cleanliness. We made the right decision, when we walked into our room, you could see and smell that the rooms and the linens were fresh and clean. The motel is older than some of the big hotels but well maintained. The owners are very friendly and the maids are amazing. We chose a large effiency and it was great, one piece of advice, bring your own pillow, theirs are very firm. The effiencies have dishes, silver, and some pots and pans. They have coffee at the font desk, but you need to bring your own coffee and filters for the regular size pots in the room. If you are looking for a motel right on the beach that is clean and economical choose Ocean Court, if you are looking for an luxurious upscale resort type hotel you probably would not be content at ocean court. We loved Ocean Court, and as the grandparents we have decided this will be our new summer vacation home. My daughter's family will stay in one of the 2 room apartment type suites and we will stay in a large effiency room. Grandparent Heaven is being close to your angels but, not sleeping on the same cloud. Oh I forgot, there is an adult club near the motel, it is on the other side of the street to the left, but you can not see it or hear it from the rooms. It did not affect our stay in any way.

Reviews.Title: “Best motel in Daytona Beach Shores”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Just back yesterday from Ocean Court Motel. This motel is the best you can find. Service is excellent, personnel and the owner DAVE are wonderful people. Best 3 weeks I ever spent and already booked for 4 weeks next year. All the people I met there were very very nice and looking forward to see them again next year. I recommend highly this motel for those who want a "super" vacation. Monique Goyer Lachute, Quebec Canada

Reviews.Title: “awesome hotel”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: The stay here was great.I stayed here during springbreak and Dave and his staff made it an awesome springbreak.

Reviews.Title: “A Nice Getaway”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We spent three nights at the Ocean Court Motel in October for a "Mom's Getaway." Dave was very friendly and had our room keys ready when we arrived several hours early. Yes, the rooms could use some updating. There is some rust on the metal chairs around the table and the very small bathroom did not have an outlet in there. Imagine what the dresser top looked like with three women staying there! The facility did suffer some damage from the hurricanes, but they were working on repairs all the time. It was a great place for the price.

Reviews.Title: “The place tostay for service”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I go to Fla once a year and always stay at the Ocean Court because they will go beyond what other motels will do for you. If you have a problem, they try to correct it as soon as you tell them. I recommend them 100%.

Reviews.Title: “loved ocean court”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: one of the most friendliness motels on the beach, dave and his staff due make your stay a pleasent experience. clean and comfortable rooms

Reviews.Title: “Feels like home!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: My family and myself just got home from 2 weeks in Daytona Beach. For a number of years we have stayed at Ocean Court Motel. The reasons are obvious. It is very clean and comfortable. We arrived the day after the hurricane and although the Hands boys were extremely busy, they were very accommodating and made us feel at home. We will continue to go back to Ocean Court as long as Dave and his boys are there. Cheers!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed this past weekend at the motel and found it wonderful. The rooms haven't been updated in many years and show their age, but everything was very, very clean and tidy. The beach was very nice and about 100 feet from our door. The pool was warm and clean. We were greeted immediately with a friendly smile and everything was in order. Certainly will stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “honeymoon”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: we got married in sept. 2003 and stayed at the ocean court motel it was wonderful week all the people there was great and friendly when we go back to daytona beach we will stay their

Reviews.Title: “The best?”
Reviews.Author: megoo98
Reviews.Content: Nice place to stay, but the best? The light fixture and rod in the bathroom were rusted. Stains on the carpet. People were nice though and helpful when our shampoo holder wasn't full and our phone needed to be turned on. Windows were boarded up for the hurricane but the plywood practically came loose and water was pouring into our room (not the motel's fault- it WAS a hurricane). We could hear practially everything going on around us. The walls were paperthin and the music loud in the morning (I was awakened by Mariah Carey one morning). No one around to tell the crazy people to stop being loud at 1 am in the morning. Good location though.

Reviews.Title: “choose something better”
Reviews.Author: citymouse22
Reviews.Content: Having made our reservation because of reviews on this board, we were expecting a decent place to stay. Our room had to have been the worse in the motel. The bathroom room door would not shut completely, leaving no privacy. The bathroom sink faucet sprayed water if you turned it higher then a trickle. The room smelled badly of old cigarette smoke and bad air freshener, as did the blankets. The room just didn't feel clean at all. Even though we had daily maid service, I felt dirty there because of the room. The lamp on the desk wouldn't work. If you moved the table, it came apart. The washer and dryer were $1.25 to use, each. That was outrageous. We drove to a laundromat instead. The maids had a habit of throwing the trash bags from each room into the court yard while cleaning, which made it look, well, trashy. We had to leave one day early because Hurricane Charley was coming, and when I asked about a refund of one nights stay from Andrew, one of the owner's sons, we were told No!! Why would anyone want to stay there for a hurricane? I don't think the roof of our room would have stayed on!! If this is all you can afford, then by all means stay here. It was convenient and affordable. But if you can afford something better, then stay somewhere else.

Reviews.Title: “good but some problems at checkout”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: It was a nice clean place. When we arrived, we notified the owner of our trip change and he thanked us and marked the final day off. The owner left for vacation and the sons took over. When we checked out, they charged me for the extra night and said they did not give refunds. This of course is ridiculous as I wa not asking for a refund, I was asking not to be overcharged (there is a difference). He would not make the bill right, so I ask for the keys back so others could share the room for the night but was told they already had the one rented out. Therefore, they were trying to double dip the room. They then refunded one night from the one room but gave us the keys to the other which someone used from our family that night. The one son wsa just a gem and went out of his way to make sure that our rooms were top notch and clean. The one that ran the desk was a bit arrogant and spoke in a manner that I feel was unacceptable to a customer who really wanted to return but will never come back again.

HotelInfo.Name: Ocean Court Motel
HotelInfo.Address: 2315 S. Atlantic Ave., Daytona Beach, FL 32118
